column1: # I anticipate this will mainly be used to suppress very_hot and very_cold. Simply remove the hash symbol from those lines to suppress them.
# Be careful when adding certain conditions like water_surface - suppression removes all effects of the condition
# which can result in bugs if you suppress one that's necessary for markets to function properly.
# Note that if you remove conditions from this list in the middle of save
column2: those conditions will not be unsuppressed.
